entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
